properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore Island VA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 2:17AM EST until February 10 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Low Water Advisory, abnormally low water levels.
For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt and
seas 3 to 5 ft.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore Island
VA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Low Water Advisory, until 3 AM EST early this
morning. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 AM to 2 PM EST
Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Below
normal water levels will result in hazardous navigating
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: LOW WATER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 2 PM EST MONDAY
